NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: I have made a grave error. 2 1 CASSAVA: The native species of Timber Hearth are amphibious. They are not safe at all from the deadly matter that has engulfed the planet! 3 2 CASSAVA: They wander onto land in search of food - and geysers populating the pools they dwell in erupt them from safety. They.. They are already on the brink of... of... 4 2 CASSAVA: No, no.. I was too blinded by my own grief! I must take action to save those still left, before it is too late..! 5 4 CASSAVA: Its location must have protected the species left inside the Sanctuary - but those who have been released outside live on borrowed time.. 6 5 CASSAVA: For now, I must make sure to quarantine those within the Sanctuary by keeping the quantum shard locked in superposition! But they too, cannot remain there indefinitely.. 7 6 CASSAVA: ..My mind is set. I know how I can protect these species. 8 7 CASSAVA: Once I have exchanged its warp core, I must launch the Inspired towards Timber Hearth at once. SY EX2 1 SY R5 6 INSP EX3.5 8
